attributes.action: Make/Bring CANNABIS back to a CLASS C.
attributes.background: CANNABIS is used for MEDICAL reasons and PERSONAL USE and is in HIGH DEMAND and MAJORITY COUNTRIES have LEGALISED it and it is getting LEGAL in UK so for that reason i believe it should be a CLASS C.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. We aren't sure what you mean by "is getting legal in the UK". Recategorising cannabis as a class C drug would not legalise it.  

If you would like cannabis legalised you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254812
